testcase.name: Book ticket in Cleartrip
testcase.system-out: Given User is on cleartrip landing page.....................................passed When User selects the "Roundtrip" options...................................passed When User enters destinations from kolkata and To chennai...................passed Then User selects both Depart and return....................................passed And User enters Passenger Details...........................................passed And User enters class details...............................................passed And user enters Prefered Airlines...........................................passed And User click on Search Flight button......................................passed
